title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI agents in action: Architecting the future of applications (INV202)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI代理实战：构建应用程序的未来架构 (INV202)
abstract: Explore how agentic AI is transforming cloud-native application architecture, unlocking faster innovation cycles and entirely new application patterns. Learn how new AWS capabilities empower builders to design secure, reasoning-driven agents that orchestrate data, code, and tools at scale, with an emphasis on governance, reliability, and cost efficiency. Discover how AWS customers are deploying production-ready agents today, and learn best practices to help you architect agentic applications that autonomously adapt, optimize, and act in real-time.
abstract_cn: 探索智能体AI如何变革云原生应用架构,释放更快的创新周期并催生全新的应用模式。了解AWS的新功能如何赋能构建者设计安全、推理驱动的智能体,在规模化场景下编排数据、代码和工具,同时强调治理、可靠性和成本效率。发现AWS客户如何在今天部署生产就绪的智能体,并学习最佳实践,帮助您构建能够自主适应、优化和实时行动的智能体应用。

presenter.name: Olawale Oladehin
presenter.title: Managing Director, Solutions Architects - Technology Segments
